mapper.insert: insert into user(phone_number, nickname, password) values(#{phoneNum}, #{nickname}, #{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nickname=#{nickName} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE user SET password=#{newPassword} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into address(user_id, address_info, contact_name, contact_phone, is_main) values(#{user_id}, #{address_info}, #{contact_name}, #{contact_phone},#{is_main})
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET is_main=#{is_main} WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
